title: WTB T206 Hindu and Piedmont ads
author: piedmont150

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Hindu and Piedmont ads
posts.post_content:
Sold my two Hindu ads depicting the t206 series a couple of years ago. Been kicking myself ever since. Haven't seen any anywhere so I thought I would ask if anyone wants to sell or has another one. Would love any Piedmont ads for same. 
Thanks all!
